# The `HTTPClient.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file defines the implementation of the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/httpclient">HTTPClient</a> library for issuing HTTP requests and handling the responses. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  curl&#95;easy&#95;setopt(Curl, CURLOPT&#95;WRITEFUNCTION, curlWriteFunction);</Highlight></CodeLine>
